--- title: Callbacks keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Callbacks used to train fastai model." ---

L1 Regularisation¶

class L1Loss[source]

L1Loss(learn, beta=0.01) :: LearnerCallback

Base class for creating callbacks for a Learner.

Printing Loss¶

class PrintLoss[source]

PrintLoss(learn) :: LearnerCallback

Prints Loss in one line as opposed to fastai Printer
